name: @junctionrelay/plugin-claude
description: Claude (Anthropic) API usage, costs, and organization monitoring plugin for JunctionRelay

junctionrelay.description: API usage, costs, and organization monitoring

setupInstructions.title: Get an Admin API Key
setupInstructions.body: Go to console.anthropic.com → Settings → Admin API keys → Create key

setupInstructions.title: Required Permissions
setupInstructions.body: Key needs org:read and usage:read permissions

setupInstructions.title: Usage Data Delay
setupInstructions.body: Usage and cost data may be delayed up to 5 minutes from Anthropic
